title: Project Planning and Management
description: Establish project goals, timeline, and resource allocation. Define project milestones and deliverables.

title: Requirements Gathering and Analysis
description: Conduct market research, gather user requirements, and analyze the feasibility of the project. Define the scope and features of the GeneticHeritageJourney application.

title: System Architecture Design
description: Design the overall system architecture for the GeneticHeritageJourney project. This includes the frontend, backend, database, and infrastructure components. The design should consider factors such as scalability, maintainability, performance, security, and user experience. Provide a high-level overview of the architecture and detailed designs for each component, with emphasis on microservices architecture to ensure modularity and ease of maintenance. Include proposed technology stack, integration points, and API documentation.

title: Database Design and Implementation
description: Design and implement the database schema to store user data, genetic information, travel itineraries, and other relevant data.

title: Backend Development
description: Develop the backend services and APIs for handling user authentication, genetic data processing, itinerary generation, and integration with third-party services (e.g., travel booking).

title: Frontend Development
description: Develop the user interface and frontend components for the GeneticHeritageJourney application, including user registration, genetic data upload, itinerary customization, and booking management.

title: Security and Compliance (Revised)
description: Implement robust security measures to protect user data, ensure compliance with relevant regulations (e.g., GDPR, HIPAA), outline procedures for data breach response, and include a plan for ongoing monitoring and regular audits.

title: Integration and Testing
description: Integrate the frontend, backend, and database components. Perform unit, integration, and end-to-end testing to ensure the application functions as expected.

title: Deployment and DevOps
description: Set up the production environment, configure continuous integration and deployment pipelines, and monitor the application's performance and scalability.

title: Documentation and User Support
description: Create user guides, API documentation, and support resources for the GeneticHeritageJourney application.
